Name: CoinsPaid
Description: CoinsPaid is a crypto-financial ecosystem including a cryptocurrency wallet, payment processor, exchange with OTC desk, a hot wallet system for businesses.CoinsPaid also issued its own utility token - $CPD. It’s a fuel of the CoinsPaid ecosystem. $CPD holders could receive up to 20% discounts on fees for staking and up to 50% discounts on fees that are paid in $CPDTelegram | Medium
